issue.title: Mesh is invisible, but I can see it as a collision. DAE model

content.raw: I am having issues with the mesh being invisible in Gazebo 9, too. In Gazebo 7 the meshes worked just fine, but for any meshes now where the material is just a diffuse color I set up in Blender, in Gazebo 9 the mesh will be invisible. If I have a texture as a image will make the image visible again, but then I had to bake all the texture from my old meshes.
content.html: I am having issues with the mesh being invisible in Gazebo 9, too. In Gazebo 7 the meshes worked just fine, but for any meshes now where the material is just a diffuse color I set up in Blender, in Gazebo 9 the mesh will be invisible. If I have a texture as a image will make the image visible again, but then I had to bake all the texture from my old meshes.
